short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that simply adds each Congressperson's largest public donor after their name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Congresstributions is a Chrome extension that simply adds a United States Congressperson's largest public donor after their name on any webpage. It's really easy...just download and go!

The information provided was retrieved from http://maplight.org.
